basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, fruiting period June-October
basic.color: Flower color white, fruit color purple black, orange yellow, green

maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Top-dressing every 4 days in spring, summer, and autumn, every 7 days in winter
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and diseased branches timely
